about_the_game:
Metaisland stands as a unique AAA Metaverse product crafted by seasoned gaming veterans and experienced crypto developers. This unique concept seamlessly bridges the Gaming and Crypto industries, boasting unparalleled innovation that is sure to capture the attention of both investors and gamers alike.

Let's delve into the distinctive features that set Metaisland apart from the crowd:

Team: Metaisland is the result of a collaborative effort by a dedicated team of ten individuals who have worked together for three years to create a truly unique and compelling product. This team boasts an impressive track record, having collectively sold millions of games. Key figures include Laurent Cluzel, an artistic director at Ubisoft for a decade, contributed to games for EA, Nicolas Choukroun who worked with Fox, Mindscape, Cryo and Ubi Soft doing 6 original games, and others with individual expertise in various aspects of development, including WEB2, WEB3, DeFi, Marketing, and Unreal development.

Game Innovation: Metaisland introduces groundbreaking real-time game balancing, ensuring that characteristics of characters, monsters, weapons, and items are dynamically streamed from a central server. With over 35 unique weapons and 20 diverse enemies, including innovative spawners, Metaisland promises a fight extravaganza for ultimate online fun. The gameplay is top-notch, featuring smooth animations and inverse kinematics, providing a diverse range of actions for maximum enjoyment.
The franchise aspect of Metaisland is truly unique, allowing island ownership, customization, and community building. With over 200 different characters, some offered as NFTs, the game concept as a sandbox is entirely procedural, offering endless playability.
As a Metaverse, Metaisland incorporates SocialFi features, including in-game chats, talk, and streaming video, akin to an evolved Facebook page. The game is rooted in an expansive universe created across seven books, paving the way for potential expansion into movies, cartoons, mobile mini-games, series, comics, and more.

Crypto Innovation: Metaisland transcends the typical NFT integration seen in other games. From innovative DeFi aspects like daily airdrops and staking to a unique subscription model allowing monthly recurring payments in both crypto and cash, the game is built with a comprehensive crypto concept.
With over 70,000 unique trading cards using ERC-721 and weapons, characters, and items utilizing ERC-1155, Metaisland embraces NFT innovations. Notably, these NFTs can be rented, creating a passive income stream for owners. Play-to-earn dynamics are delegated to island owners, ensuring high usability of the $ISL token.
The ranking system adds a social dimension to Metaisland, allowing players to be ranked based on their in-game actions, creating an internal economy tied to the native token.

In conclusion, Metaisland emerges as a highly evolved GameFi product, surpassing existing offerings. Positioned as a lasting and ever-growing Metaverse, its rich feature set, persistent team, and unique innovations make it a valuable addition to any portfolio, comparable to Sandbox, BigTime, or Illuvium. Metaisland aspires to secure a top 10 rank, driven by its persistence, qualifications, and investor-friendly concept.
Highlight/Vision

  • Virtual World simulation: stunning photorealistic tropical island and photo real looking characters.
  • Social system: Unique participation system, that is rewarding the best players.
  • Gamification: multiplayer TPS with a solo adventure, and multiplayer with 1000 players on each Island.
  • Made by an experienced team of game veterans with experience publishing for Fox, EA, Ubi Soft, Mindscape, SEGA, Nintendo, Psygnosis, Cryo etc...as well as crypto specialists.
  • Scalability with an unique Franchising system allowing an unlimited number of players with a limited number of staff to moderate and manage the entire network.
  • Multiple revenu sources via pay to play, NFT sales, Merchandising and in game purchases.
  • Positive experience, players teaming together, non toxic environment.
  • Role Playing mechanism inspired by Dungeon and Dragon to manage the abilities of the players, combat, fighting and characters powers.
  • No technical limitation, Metaisland is working on Consoles/PC without a VR headset

content_descriptors.notes: Contains slang, smocking junkies and bikini girls on the beach.
